data.Name: DJ Mark Farina
data.Bio: Mark Farina (born in Chicago, Illinois, USA on March 25, 1969) is a disc jockey and musician, known for his Chicago house, acid jazz and downtempo works. Notable releases include Mood (KMS Records, 1989) and the Mushroom Jazz series (Om Records, 1996â€“2008). Nowadays known also from house compilations El Divinio. He is primarily identified with the house music scene in San Francisco, California, where he resides, but is involved in the production of numerous highly-regarded parties, including melodic. Read more on Last.fm
